hero.title: Your trusted partner in exporting premium Egyptian frozen products.
hero.subtitle: We specialize in delivering high-quality frozen vegetables, fruits, and herbs to global markets—ensuring freshness, flavor, and reliability in every shipment.

about.title: Quality is the core of Athenas Foods.
about.subtitle: Our quality standards include:
points: Full compliance with international food safety systems
Strict raw material selection from approved farms
Continuous monitoring at each production stage
Full traceability from farm to container

quote.text: At Athenas Foods, we believe that quality is not just a standard—it's a promise. Every frozen product we export carries with it the dedication of Egyptian farmers and the excellence of our processing facilities.
quote.author: Ahmed Hassan

products.title: Featured Products
products.subtitle: Explore our premium selection of frozen products, carefully selected and processed to maintain the highest quality standards.

categories.title: Product Categories
categories.subtitle: Discover our wide range of frozen products across various categories.

partners.title: Our Global Partners
partners.subtitle: We proudly serve clients across continents, building lasting relationships based on trust and quality.

banner.title: Ready to Source Premium Frozen Products?
banner.subtitle: Partner with Athenas Foods and experience the finest quality Egyptian frozen products. From farm to your facility, we ensure excellence at every step.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products and services.

questions.question: What types of frozen products do you export?
questions.answer: We export a wide variety of frozen products including vegetables (peas, green beans, mixed vegetables), fruits (strawberries, mangoes), herbs, and potato products. All products are IQF processed to maintain freshness.

questions.question: What certifications do you have?
questions.answer: Athenas Foods holds ISO 22000, HACCP, and GLOBALG.A.P certifications. We comply with international food safety standards and undergo regular audits to ensure quality.

questions.question: What is your minimum order quantity?
questions.answer: Our minimum order quantity varies by product but typically starts at one 20-foot container. Contact us for specific product MOQs and pricing.

questions.question: How do you ensure product quality during shipping?
questions.answer: We use refrigerated containers maintained at -18°C throughout the shipping process. Each shipment includes temperature monitoring and documentation for complete traceability.

questions.question: Which countries do you ship to?
questions.answer: We export to over 25 countries across Europe, Middle East, Asia, and Africa. Contact us to confirm shipping availability to your specific location.

footer.description: Your trusted partner for premium Egyptian frozen products. Quality, reliability, and excellence in every shipment.
footer.address: Industrial Zone, 10th of Ramadan City, Egypt
